name: listed
description: A super-smooth frontend to search available homes in the area.
author: Scott McCormack

scripts.build: npm run build:scripts && npm run build:styles && npm run build:markup
scripts.build:scripts: browserify client/app.coffee --extension=.coffee | uglifyjs --screw-ie8 | hashmark -n public/app.js -s -l 8 -m public/assets.json 'public/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.build:styles: lessc --glob client/app.less | autoprefixer | cleancss --s0 | hashmark -n public/app.css -s -l 8 -m public/assets.json 'public/{name}-{hash}{ext}'
scripts.watch: parallelshell 'npm run watch:scripts' 'npm run watch:styles' 'npm run watch:markup'
